data.name: 爆款展台
data.template:
{
    "attribute": {
        "productId": "0",
        "name": "爆款展台"
    },
	"references":[
		{
			"referVarType":"main",
			"expressions": [
				{
					"key": "title",
			        "alias": "标题",
			        "validation": {
						"minLen": 16,
						"maxLen": 32,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
						},
					"tips":"标题长度16到32个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "title",
					"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":true
				},
				{
					"key": "show_url",
			        "alias": "显示网址",
			        "validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
			            "maxLen": 36,
			            "required": true,
			            "illegalChars": "",
						"type":"domainCheck"
					},
			        "tips":"请填写显示网址，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType":"show",
					"isShowKey":true
				},
				{
					"key": "target_url",
			        "alias": "目标网址",
			        "validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
			            "maxLen": 1024,
			            "required": true,
			            "illegalChars": "",
						"type":"domainCheck"
					},
			        "tips":"http(s)开头，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品1名称",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
						"maxLen": 12,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度4到12个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_subpath_text",
					"alias": "产品1描述",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
			            "maxLen": 14,
			            "required": true
			            },
					"tips":"长度4到14个字符",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "text",
					"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "pic1_img",
					"alias": "产品1图片",
					"validation": {
						"suffixes": [
						"jpg",
						"jpeg",
						"png"
						],
						"maxSize": 100,
						"width": 150,
						"height": 120,
						"required": true
					},
					"tips":"请上传150*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg,png",
					"inputType": "image",
					"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_subpath_url",
					"alias": "产品1URL",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写产品1目标地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "2_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品2名称",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
						"maxLen": 12,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度4到12个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "2_subpath_text",
					"alias": "产品2描述",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
			            "maxLen": 14,
			            "required": true
			            },
					"tips":"长度4到14个字符",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "text",
					"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "pic2_img",
					"alias": "产品2图片",
					"validation": {
						"suffixes": [
						"jpg",
						"jpeg",
						"png"
						],
						"maxSize": 100,
						"width": 150,
						"height": 120,
						"required": true
					},
					"tips":"请上传150*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg,png",
					"inputType": "image",
					"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "2_subpath_url",
					"alias": "产品2URL",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写产品2目标地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "3_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品3名称",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
						"maxLen": 12,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度4到12个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "3_subpath_text",
					"alias": "产品3描述",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
			            "maxLen": 14,
			            "required": true
			            },
					"tips":"长度4到14个字符",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "text",
					"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "pic3_img",
					"alias": "产品3图片",
					"validation": {
						"suffixes": [
						"jpg",
						"jpeg",
						"png"
						],
						"maxSize": 100,
						"width": 150,
						"height": 120,
						"required": true
					},
					"tips":"请上传150*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg,png",
					"inputType": "image",
					"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "3_subpath_url",
					"alias": "产品3URL",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写产品3目标地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
				}
			]
		}
	]
}
